item.title: FAQs
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Looks like no questions have been asked yet! If you have a question, feel free to file an issue or ask in the working group’s Zulip stream.

item.title: Notes
item.description: Self-Profile Meeting Notes This document contains meeting notes from the self-profile working group. 2019-03-05: Meeting Written by: @wesleywiser Purpose of meeting: Initial meeting to get organized and decide on some next steps. Agenda: Current status update Where to track work? What does an Minimum Viable Product (MVP) look like? Next work items? Current Status After a few rounds of experimentation, we have a -Z self-profile option available in the nightly compliler.
